00047     @Action
00048     public void showAboutBox() {
00049         if (aboutBox == null) {
00050             JFrame mainFrame = ScheatorApp.getApplication().getMainFrame();
00051             aboutBox = new ScheatorAboutBox(mainFrame);
00052             aboutBox.setLocationRelativeTo(mainFrame);
00053         }
00054         ScheatorApp.getApplication().show(aboutBox);
00055     }
